data.comment: The match is underway at Opel Arena.
The match is underway at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dusseldorf have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Dusseldorf's Markus Suttner gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Soren Storks signals a Dusseldorf throw-in in Mainz's half.
Dusseldorf push forward at Opel Arena and Kevin Stoger gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mainz defence.
Matthias Zimmermann of Dusseldorf gets in a strike, but is off target.
Soren Storks awards Mainz a goal kick.
In Mainz Dusseldorf attack through Erik Thommy. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Free kick Dusseldorf.
Dusseldorf's Erik Thommy misses with an attempt on goal.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dusseldorf's half?
Throw-in for Mainz close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Dusseldorf in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf.
Dusseldorf attack but Niko Giesselmann's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Dusseldorf are whistled for offside.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Dusseldorf.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Dusseldorf territory.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Dusseldorf.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dusseldorf are coming forward and Markus Suttner gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Soren Storks awards Mainz a goal kick.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Dusseldorf get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
The match at Opel Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Robin Zentner, who is down injured.
Robin Zentner for Mainz is back on the field again.
Free kick for Dusseldorf in the half of Mainz.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Mainz.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf in their own half.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Soren Storks awards the away team a throw-in.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf just outside Mainz's area.
Kaan Ayhan (Dusseldorf) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Dusseldorf in Mainz.
Can Dusseldorf capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Free kick for Dusseldorf in their own half.
Markus Suttner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dusseldorf.
Important block from the Mainz defence as Kevin Stoger fires in a strike for Dusseldorf.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz are caught offside.
Kevin Stoger for Dusseldorf has been booked by Soren Storks and receives a first yellow card.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Dusseldorf are in shooting range from this free kick.
Soren Storks signals a throw-in for Dusseldorf, close to Mainz's area.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf.
Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta has been booked in Mainz.
Erik Thommy (Dusseldorf) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Dusseldorf.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kevin Stoger for Dusseldorf gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Dusseldorf territory.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Mainz.
Free kick for Dusseldorf in the half of Mainz.
Soren Storks blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Dusseldorf have a goal kick.
Achim Beierlorzer (Mainz) is making a first substitution, with Florian Muller replacing Robin Zentner.
The home team replace Ronael Pierre-Gabriel with Levin Oztunali.
Dusseldorf are pushing forward but Markus Suttner's finish is wide of the goal.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Dusseldorf pushes forward through Erik Thommy, whose finish on goal is saved.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dusseldorf in the half of Mainz.
Soren Storks signals a Dusseldorf throw-in in Mainz's half.
Throw-in for Dusseldorf in the half of Mainz.
Throw-in Mainz.
Soren Storks awards the away team a throw-in.
Dusseldorf have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Soren Storks awards Mainz a goal kick.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Soren Storks signals a Mainz throw-in in Dusseldorf's half.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Levin Oztunali scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jean-Philippe Mateta to set up the goal.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Dusseldorf to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Free kick Dusseldorf.

Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Can Dusseldorf get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dusseldorf are pushing forward but Valon Berisha's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Dusseldorf's Valon Berisha gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dusseldorf.
In Mainz, Robin Quaison of Mainz is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Dusseldorf at Opel Arena.
Throw-in Dusseldorf.
Uwe Rosler is making the team's first substitution at Opel Arena with Rouwen Hennings replacing Markus Suttner.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dusseldorf have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Corner awarded to Dusseldorf.
Dusseldorf's Niko Giesselmann goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Dusseldorf awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcel Sobottka is replacing Adam Bodzek for Dusseldorf at Opel Arena.
Mainz needs to be cautious. Dusseldorf have an attacking throw-in.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf in their own half.
Red card in Mainz! Jean-Philippe Mateta has been shown a second yellow card by Soren Storks.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andre Hoffmann for Dusseldorf who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The away team have replaced Valon Berisha with Kelvin Ofori. This is the third substitution made today by Uwe Rosler.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Andre Hoffmann has recovered and rejoins the match in Mainz.
Soren Storks awards the home team a throw-in.
Soren Storks signals a Dusseldorf throw-in in Mainz's half.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Dusseldorf territory.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Dusseldorf in their own half.
Free kick for Dusseldorf in their own half.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dusseldorf in the half of Mainz.
Kenan Karaman grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Opel Arena.
Dusseldorf have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Can Dusseldorf get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dusseldorf.
Dusseldorf are coming forward and Andre Hoffmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mainz have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Mainz make their third substitution with Edimilson Fernandes replacing Leandro Martins.
